#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,i;
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        long long ar[n],s=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&ar[i]);
            s+=ar[i];
        }
        for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
            printf("%lld ",ar[i]);
        printf("\n%lld\n",s);
    }
    return 0;
}
